com.amazonaws.http

Class UrlHttpClient.CurlBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.http.UrlHttpClient.CurlBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    UrlHttpClient

    protected final class UrlHttpClient.CurlBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to build a curl message.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CurlBuilder(java.net.URL url)
      Builds a new curl command for the given URL.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        This object for chaining.

      • setContentOverflow

        public UrlHttpClient.CurlBuilder setContentOverflow(boolean contentOverflow)
        Sets whether or not the content is too large for the curl command. Content of length greater than Integer.MAX_VALUE are considered too long. If set, the curl should not be logged as it will be invalid.
        Parameters:
        contentOverflow - Whether or not the content is too long to print.
        Returns:
        This object for chaining.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Returns:
        Whether or not this object is valid for printing.

      • build

        public java.lang.String build()
        Creates a curl command that can be replayed from command line.
        Returns:
        The curl command.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If isValid() returns false.
